Package com.atakmap.android.dropdown

Class DropDownManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.atakmap.android.dropdown.DropDownManager
  • public class DropDownManager
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    All DropDownReceivers should use this class in order to register.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DropDownManager getInstance()

      • getTopDropDownKey

        public java.lang.String getTopDropDownKey()
        Return the top right side drop down key. Primary use case: Used by the Setting Screen so that if the top dropdown has an associated key in the Tool Preferences then when setting is launched it will launch the appropriate sub menu.

        Note: Drop-downs marked as transient will be ignored

      • isTopDropDown

        public boolean isTopDropDown​(DropDownReceiver dropDown)
        Check if the supplied drop-down is currently on top (not necessarily visible)
        Parameters:
        dropDown - Drop down
        Returns:
        True if this drop-down is on top

      • shouldCloseFirst

        public boolean shouldCloseFirst()
        Whether any active drop-down has the "close before tool" flag
        Returns:
        True if the active drop-down should close first on back-button

      • dispose

        public void dispose()

      • registerDropDownReceiver

        public void registerDropDownReceiver​(DropDownReceiver receiver,
                                     AtakBroadcast.DocumentedIntentFilter filter)
        Register a DropDownReceiver to be run in the main activity thread. The receiver will be called with any broadcast Intent that matches filter, in the main application thread.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The DropDownReceiver to handle the broadcast
        filter - Selects the Intent broadcasts to be received.

      • unregisterDropDownReceiver

        public void unregisterDropDownReceiver​(DropDownReceiver receiver)
        Unregister a DropDownReceiver. This will stop the receiver from being called by a broadcast Intent. This is the same as com.atakmap.android.ipc.AtakBroadcast.getInstance().unregisterReceiver(receiver)
        Parameters:
        receiver - The DropDownReceiver to stop handling the broadcast.

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive​(android.content.Context context,
                      android.content.Intent intent)
        Specified by:
        onReceive in class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

      • closeAllDropDowns

        public void closeAllDropDowns()
        Close all drop downs. Should only be used when changing orientations or quitting the application.

      • hidePane

        public void hidePane()
        PUBLIC ACCESS TO THESE WILL BE REMOVED IN THE NEXT RELEASE. THERE ARE MANY WORDS THAT CAN BE USED TO DESCRIBE MY STATE RIGHT NOW.

      • unHidePane

        public void unHidePane()
        PUBLIC ACCESS TO THESE WILL BE REMOVED IN THE NEXT RELEASE. THERE ARE MANY WORDS THAT CAN BE USED TO DESCRIBE MY STATE RIGHT NOW.

                             java.lang.String assocKey,
                             DropDown.OnStateListener listener)
        Add a drop-down state listener for a given association key
        Parameters:
        assocKey - Association key
        listener - Drop-down state listener

                                DropDown.OnStateListener listener)
